about: Adding issues using the report() function
title: "[BUG - using report()]"
labels: ''

---

**This should only be used with the `report()` function.** Most of the relevant content should have been copied to your clipboard; simply **paste it here**, and add any additional information that you deem useful. This copy/paste functionality is done using pyperclip which might not work immediately if you are using Linux; see https://github.com/asweigart/pyperclip for details.
